TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWebPartRow

summary.span: 定义使用单个字段数据连接两个服务器控件的提供者接口。

span.span: Defines a provider interface for connecting two server controls using a single field of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口是用于与 Web 部件连接而设计的。This interface is designed to be used with Web Parts connections. 在 Web 部件连接中，两个驻留在的服务器控件区域建立连接和共享数据，使用一个控件充当使用者和中充当提供程序的其他控件。In a Web Parts connection, two server controls that reside in a zone establish a connection and share data, with one control acting as the consumer and the other control acting as a provider. 共享 Web 部件连接中的数据的机制是接口实例，该提供程序提供给使用者通过回调方法。The mechanism for sharing data in a Web Parts connection is an interface instance, which the provider serves to the consumer by means of a callback method. 若要建立连接，使用者和提供程序必须同时使用相同的接口类型的共享数据。To establish a connection, the consumer and provider must both work with the same interface type for sharing data. 如果使用者不能识别提供方发送的接口类型，则仍可能通过转换器连接控件 (对象)，将转换到类型提供程序发送的接口实例的使用者识别。If the consumer does not recognize the interface type sent by the provider, it is still possible to connect the controls by means of a transformer (a object) that translates the interface instance sent by the provider into a type that the consumer recognizes. 有关连接的详细信息，请参阅和[Web 部件连接概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b)。For details on connections, see and [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b). 接口是随附的 Web 部件控件集用作用于创建基于数据行的连接的标准接口的提供程序接口。The interface is a provider interface included with the Web Parts control set as a standard interface for creating connections based on a data row. 你还可以创建自定义接口，以用于 Web 部件连接，但在许多数据驱动 Web 应用程序，十分有用来创建基于相同的字段的连接 (有关详细信息，请参阅接口)，表 (有关详细信息，请参阅接口），或从数据源的行。You can also create custom interfaces to use with Web Parts connections, but in many data-driven Web applications, it is useful to create connections based on a common field (for details, see the interface), table (for details, see the interface), or row from the data source. 在典型的连接，控制操作，因为提供程序将实现接口，并为特殊的回调方法中的使用者提供接口的实例。In a typical connection, a control acting as a provider would implement the interface and provide an instance of the interface to consumers in a special callback method. 例如，提供程序可能会实施到你的用户信息表中的用户相对应的行的接口。For example, the provider might implement an interface for a row that corresponds to a user in your user information table. 另一个与使用者将定义用于接收接口实例中，无法然后提取用户数据，使用它来查找有关该用户的帐户的其他信息并显示所有信息的特殊方法充当控件相关在页上该用户。Another control acting as a consumer would define a special method to receive the interface instance, and could then extract the user data, use it to look up additional information about that user's accounts, and display all the information related to that user on the page. 接口具有两个公开的成员。The interface has two exposed members. 属性返回有关封装在数据行的架构信息对象。The property returns schema information about the data row encapsulated in a object. 方法声明 （如提供程序控件） 的实现器用于检索接口实例的行数据时调用回调方法的方法。The method declares a method that an implementer (such as a provider control) uses to retrieve the interface instance's row data when the callback method is invoked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用的两个控件之间的静态连接接口。The following code example demonstrates how to create a static connection between two controls using the interface. 代码示例包含三个部分：The code example has three parts: - 两个自定义的源代码可以形成连接使用的控件接口，其中一个控件充当提供程序，以及另一个充当使用者。Source code for two custom controls that can form a connection using the interface, with one control acting as the provider, and the other acting as the consumer. - 网页上承载的控件和声明中的持久性格式的静态连接。A Web page that hosts the controls and declares the static connection in persistence format. - 示例代码运行时，会发生什么情况的说明。A description of what happens when the example code runs. 下面的代码示例的第一部分是两个自定义控件的源代码。The first part of the code example is the source code for the two custom controls. 首先实现的提供程序是代码接口。First is the code for the provider, which implements the interface. 为了简单起见，在示例中，提供程序使用一些数据，而不是连接到数据库中创建一个表。For simplicity in the example, the provider creates a table with some data rather than connecting to a database. `GetConnectionInterface`方法用作提供程序的连接点，接口实例返回给使用者的回调方法。The `GetConnectionInterface` method serves as the provider's connection point, the callback method that returns the interface instance to the consumer. 它可以与使用者，来检索从名为其方法中的提供程序接口实例`SetConnectionInterface`，这将标有`ConnectionConsumer`属性。As for the consumer, it retrieves the interface instance from the provider in its method named `SetConnectionInterface`, which is marked with a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute. 在中检索的接口，使用者，实例后其`OnPreRender`方法，调用的实现提供程序，检索实际数据并将其写入到页中的方法。After retrieving the instance of the interface, the consumer, in its `OnPreRender` method, calls the implementation of the method in the provider, to retrieve the actual data and write it to the page. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview/CS/IRowSamples.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview/VB/IRowSamples.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例的第二部分是声明了静态连接和主机控件的网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page that declares the static connection and hosts the controls. 页面顶部附近是`Register`声明 App_Code 目录中包含的源代码的命名空间的指令。Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive that declares the namespace of the source code contained in the App_Code directory. 使用声明连接``元素。The connection is declared using an `` element. 在中声明的自定义的使用者和提供程序控件``中的元素``元素，它需要它们才能进行连接 (两者必须驻留在继承自的区域内类)。The custom consumer and provider controls are declared in a `` element within an `` element, which is required for them to be able to connect (they must reside within a zone that inherits from the class). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中的页。Load the page in a browser. 使用者控件将显示从指定的行，通过的实例，该提供程序可以提供的数据接口。The consumer control displays the data provided from the specified row, which the provider makes available through an instance of the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetRowData(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowCallback callback) cil managed

param.name: callback
param.span: 一个 委托，包含接收数据的方法的地址。

span.span: A delegate that contains the address of a method that receives the data.

summary.span: 返回行的数据，接口将使用该行作为两个 控件之间的连接基础。

span.span: Returns the data for the row that is being used by the interface as the basis of a connection between two controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法来检索接口所传递的数据行值。Use this method to retrieve the data row values passed by the interface. 提供程序实现此方法，并使用者调用它的点时使用者准备好处理或呈现数据。The provider implements this method, and the consumer invokes it at the point when the consumer is ready to process or render data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示实现和利用方法。The following code example shows the implementation and use of the method. 完整的示例所示的类概览接口。The complete example is shown in the class overview for the interface. 提供者控件实现方法，返回的数据表中的特定行的值。The provider control implements the method, returning the value of a particular row in the data table. 使用者控件调用方法在其`OnPreRender`方法，以便此数据的值可以写入页。The consumer control calls the method in its `OnPreRender` method, so that the value of the data can be written to the page. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview/CS/IRowSamples.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview/VB/IRowSamples.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Schema As PropertyDescriptorCollection

summary.span: 获取用于在两个 控件之间共享数据的数据行的架构信息。

span.span: Gets the schema information for a data row that is used to share data between two controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供的数据的属性信息。This property provides property information for the data. 使用接口在连接中，你获取对象，该引用的对象属性。Using the interface in a connection, you get a object, which is referenced by the property. 协定指定该调用`Schema[n].GetValue(RowData)`返回的值*n*第一行中的列。The contract specifies that calling `Schema[n].GetValue(RowData)` returns the value of the *n*th column in the row. 你需要使用属性来获取行中的值。You need to use the property to get the values in the row. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示实现和利用属性。The following code example shows the implementation and use of the property. 完整的示例所示的类概览接口。The complete example is shown in the class overview for the interface. 提供者控件实现属性。The provider control implements the property. 然后，使用者控件在其`RenderContents`方法时，查询属性来检索有关行的信息，如行数据写入页。Then the consumer control, in its `RenderContents` method, queries the property to retrieve information about the row as it writes the row data to the page. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview/CS/IRowSamples.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebPartRow_Overview/VB/IRowSamples.vb#2)]
